name: Bertin Velez
text: The manager is awesome... my order got scramble. But he fixed right away all in all he never got upset and the pizza and chicken wings were awesome!!!

name: David Gresham
text: Pizza was good salad bar was good. Not sure why there was bad reviews on here. Service was good too.

name: Anais Lopez
text: Super hot fresh pizza cooked to perfection

name: Ron LaCome
text: I am no longer ordering from pizza hut for delivery in grand junction. They have a call center that the person does not like his job. Every time I call for delivery, the guy receiving the calls does not know how to speak into the phone. I â€¦More

name: Anita Martini
text: PH is a great value and you get exactly what you are expecting, perfect. This store is consistent getting it right: food is always as ordered, hot and delicious and delivery is very fast, friendly. Tried other pizza joints in GJ, this one is the best overall.

name: M S
text: This was by far the worst online ordering experience ever. I placed my order online and was given a 21-31 estimated delivery window at 1:49. At 2:02 I recieved a text message that my offer was out for delivery. When I had not recieved my â€¦More

name: Courtney Borden
text: A great place to eat! We stopped in with the kids last night, and had an excellent dinner with fantastic service. Dominick was personable and genuinely happy to help, he put a smile on all of our faces - we were so glad we decided to give it a try!

name: Zach Lee
text: Dominos exists everyone, why would you go to pizza hut? They literally drown their pizza in sauce, its 85% sauce, 8% bread, and 7% toppings. Use less sauce, please. Even if you ask for light sauce. The good thing about this pizza hut is it's a very nice building with a nice drive thru, but the pizza just isnt good

name: Elizabeth Gonzales
text: Very poor customer service. I donâ€™t know what position Susan is in, but she is extremely rude and unprofessional. I understand itâ€™s fast food, but you have a job so you should actually do it and treat customers well. If you hate your job quit and make everyoneâ€™s life easier ðŸ™‚

name: Barbara Maruca
text: Good specials.  Pizza is good. Not the best but makes a quick meal once in a while.

name: Riad Shash
text: Perfect pizza crust! Friendly staff.

name: Jayne Allen
text: Meatlovers pizza tasted like it had been standing around for awhile.  Needless not very fresh. Cheesy sticks but not cut very good. Fast delivery though. It wasn't worth the money. I have had much better luck before so i dont know

name: Katie Zollner Zeck
text: You can eat-in instead of just carryout or pickup! Super nice employees!

name: patrick mccaslin
text: Call center person had very heavy accent had to repeat myself many times for sure daughter $10 special minimum $12 purchase to deliver plus they charge you 399 to deliver what a crock

name: Christopher Harper
text: Great staff and great food! Rachel is an amazing asset to your team, always smiling and friendly.

name: Gail Pennington
text: Always a great pizza and delivery time is always quick.

name: Emily Garcia
text: Worst pizza I have ever had. We got wings and pizza. So about 57 dollars. And we barley ate any. Was so so greasy. We usually order from north and have great Pizza but was told to call monument to order. Will never eat here again.

name: Jaimie Baca
text: Great service Great Food

name: Kent
text: Yummy

name: Gene Mitchell
text: Terrible phone call center ordering. Website says we're out of the delivery area yet they've been delivering pizza to us for 3 years! Transfer from the call center to the actual store to place the order for delivery leads to exceptionally long phone waits and more frustration. Their service is going downhill fast!

name: Rick Cunningham
text: Well this new Pizza Hut sucks compared to the old one! Pizza prices went up, pizzas got smaller. You can only order to go but they have three tables you can sit at. They do not have and will not give you any water unless you buy a bottle! â€¦More

name: susie feuerborn
text: My driver was rude and when i asked for the plates, and cheese packets that i had asked for when i ordered all he had to say was "my bad". Really??? You never tell a customer my bad!!! Wish i hadn't have tipped him!!!!!

name: Douglas Darnell
text: It was the best pizza I've had in a long long time

name: Dominic Fletcher
text: We were looking for a place to A. Get some pizza and B. Sit down. This is not the place for either. The pizza was bland and overcooked, and the staff wasn't professional at all. The place had seats, of course, but it was obvious that they â€¦More

name: Jennifer Gallegos
text: They were advertising all you can eat at the corner with someone holding a sign.  We went in and no salad..went to go look for the pizza and guess what..no pizza or breadsticks...if you are going to advertise then you should meet the demand duh...we were very disappointed. ..by the time they took pizza out..people had already took it all

name: Brendan Hines
text: I think that spices and well......all flavor were omitted from our pizza. Maybe the most tasteless pizza I've ever had.

name: Aaron Aron
text: Charged my card without my permission! Told me to call my bank and deal with it. Manager "Nancy" gave false info for Area manager when asked for it to call and make right. Ultimately I had to open a fraud case with my bank. This is the WORST pizza hut I have even seen and I haven't even eaten here ever!

name: Justin Crowley
text: All of these must be disgruntled ex employees. Placed online order. Delivered in 23 minutes. Fresh hot pizza and wings. Taste is great.

name: Michael Ruspil
text: Service was quick, pizza exceeded expectations

name: dullahan 333
text: I got 5 phone calls from this Pizza Hut location, in a row, all from 8:57 p.m. to 9:01 p.m. I'm not sure why or how y'all even got my number, considering that I haven't even been to Grand Junction in about 6 months. Ridiculous. I went ahead â€¦More

name: Amber Moon
text: Delivery has been on point! The pizza the wings the bread sticks all fantastic! Thanks guys!

name: Jim O
text: Totally NOT impressed. We ordered takeout, they told us to call Fruita. We called Frutia and they said call Monument. Finally got it ordered, but it went to the opposite side of town as they messed up the address and was cold after an hour â€¦More

name: Aaron Frick
text: Pizza tastes fine. I just have a hard time paying $65 for 5 large pizzas that frankly, arent very big.

name: Tracy Goetz Dvorak-Marshall
text: I just love Pizza Hut. Period. The price is right and the food is very comforting.

name: Marcus pelz
text: I use to like it.until they got a new manager. Then I just feel like the business is falling.. they don't hire there people right. Food isn't that good any more. The manager seems to lay off the people he don't like. Because now I have no job because of him.smh

name: Audra Tanner
text: Came here spur of the moment with a school group and had amazing service. Our server Kaley was amazing!! Thanks for helping our group warm up on a cold rainy fall day!

name: Katie C
text:
THE WORST!! I have tried to give this place a chance, many times even, but they will always DISAPPOINT!!
I work close by at night. One time they NEVER showed up! I even called to make â€¦More

name: jerry nope
text: I have ordered from this location since I have moved to grand junction Colorado and up till tonight May 5 2017 I have been happy with them but I put an order in tonight and about an hour or so went by so I called to ask if they was going â€¦More

name: Fawn D'Anza
text: We have ordered from here 5 times. This is the 3rd time our food has shown up cold and gross. We wait for over an hour every time! You have to be kidding me this is the WORST PIZZA HUT in the world! Next time we will drive to another one and pick up myself.

name: Lianna Rose
text: Fast easy eats

name: Tanya & Zach
text: Great food and friendly service. I hope this Pizza Hut stays in the community as some of the others are closing.

name: Andrew
text: This pizza hut is extremely bad. Always late cold and slow they have no pride in their job. This location needs to be closed. Worst customer service ever

name: Christine Jackson
text: Slow service, mediocre food.  Ate dinner, salad bar was very clearly left over from lunch (old and disgusting).

name: Jose Aponte
text: Fast taking pizzas

name: Vickie Eyherabide
text: Saying hi.

name: RBO
text: Better than some

name: Tim Kubat
text: Permanently closed as of 4/1.  Relocating to new store at 417 Monument Road.

name: Landy Boyle
text: Greasy

name: Brenden Whitney
text: Gross

name: panda fitz
text: Pizza guy drew me a bitching dinosaur on my box but forgot my ranch!

name: Justin Coan
text: good.

name: Crissie Hillis
text: Lunch buffet

name: Elizabeth Piper
text: Comfortable.

name: Shona Kipfer
text: Pizza was delicious.

name: David Underwood
text: Lunch buffet is great!

name: Bridget
text: Last night they brought me the worse pizza ever. It was cold and seemed like it had been sitting out all night. It was also thrown together   very sloppy.
